column4: QUESTION: When I try to add any repository, it gives me an error like : "Error reading https://launchpad.net/api/1.0/~libreoffice/+archive/ppa: <urlopen error [Errno 111] Connection refused>"
If it helps, I am behind my Institute's proxy server
I use the command like this: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:libreoffice/ppa
